property.name: objectDescription
property.value: Information about a milestone. A milestone may represent a single point in time or a range depending on the value of isDateRange().

property.name: summary
property.value: A description of the entity.

property.name: description
property.value: A description of the entity.

property.name: objectDescription
property.value: A description of the entity.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Is All Day

property.name: summary
property.value: Tests if this Milestone is an all day event.

property.name: label
property.value: Is All Day

property.name: description
property.value: Tests if this Milestone is an all day event. An all-day event does not have a meaningful time component in the date.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Is Instructional Day

property.name: summary
property.value: Tests if this Milestone is an instructional day.

property.name: label
property.value: Is Instructional Day

property.name: description
property.value: Tests if this Milestone is an instructional day.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Is Relative

property.name: summary
property.value: Tests if this Milestone is relative to another Milestone.

property.name: label
property.value: Is Relative

property.name: description
property.value: Tests if this Milestone is relative to another Milestone.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Relative Anchor Milestone Id

property.name: summary
property.value: Gets the anchor Milestone to which this Milestone is relative.

property.name: label
property.value: Relative Anchor Milestone Id

property.name: description
property.value: Gets the anchor Milestone to which this Milestone is relative.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Is Date Range

property.name: summary
property.value: Tests if this milestone has a date range.

property.name: label
property.value: Is Date Range

property.name: description
property.value: Tests if this milestone has a date range.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Start Date

property.name: summary
property.value: The start date and time of the milestone.

property.name: label
property.value: Start Date

property.name: description
property.value: The start date and time of the milestone.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: End Date

property.name: summary
property.value: The end date and time of the milestone.

property.name: label
property.value: End Date

property.name: description
property.value: The end date and time of the milestone. The end date must be equal to or greater that the start.

property.name: summary
property.value: Create and last update info for the structure.

property.name: description
property.value:
Create and last update info for the structure. This is optional and treated as read only since the data is set by the internals of the service during maintenance operations.
Contains audit trail information about the creation and last update of this object Also contains the version ind used for optimistic locking.
Attempts to set or update should result in a ReadOnlyException being thrown.

property.name: objectDescription
property.value:
Create and last update info for the structure. This is optional and treated as read only since the data is set by the internals of the service during maintenance operations.
Contains audit trail information about the creation and last update of this object Also contains the version ind used for optimistic locking.
Attempts to set or update should result in a ReadOnlyException being thrown.
